website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking, comfortable tennis shoe that fits most wearers well and offers responsive performance on the court.
pros: Features ADIPRENE® cushioning in the heel and forefoot for support and shock absorption
Upper material is both supportive and breathable
Has sleek-looking style that pairs nicely with other tennis gear
cons: Sizes may run slightly large and wide for some
Material is a bit stiff during the break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Usually I have had zero issues with shoes I’ve ordered via Amazon. I completely wore out my last pair, but that took several months. This pair took only two days of tennis. The eyelet on the one shoe separated from the shoe after only about 6 hours of tennis. I always order Adidas Barricade shoes and this is the very first quality control issue I’ve had, So I don’t know if these are knockoffs and made with cheap materials or what, but I will be asking for a full refund. I’ve included pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: I have had injury playing tennis and I have to wear some good shoes that support the ankle
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I have to say this Tennis shoe is top of the line if you are ;looking for budge Adidas shoes. I have had injury playing tennis and I have to wear some good shoes that support the ankle. After seeing this one and used it, I have to say it was the best Tennis shoes I have ever seen. Very well made and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: maytham

customer_reviews.title: Stable Feet & Game
customer_reviews.text: I've stayed with Addidas Barricade models because of the good fit and stability they always provide. Particularly when they are new these shoes add to my confidence. I feel I can move and stop reliably and achieve the best game for a young 70 year old. I can push off for power on ground strokes and move fast and keep my balance at the net.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits well, does not breath as well as expected. Shoe grabs well on the pickle ball court, supports foot on the side as well. After playing 3 or four times does not show any wear. Have to see how it holds up after several weeks. I have been playing pickball for 8 weeks in these shoes, I play at least 4 hours a week, they show very little wear, they grab well and support my feet well. I like them well enough to purchase a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: The lacing method (small cloth eyelets) is inadequate and prone ...
customer_reviews.text: The lacing method (small cloth eyelets) is inadequate and prone to breaking, as they did on one sneaker after a few weeks of use. Contacting Adidas has been nothing but frustrating. A "case number" was created, but after two months nothing has been resolved. I'll update this review if they stand by their product. Update:Adidas came through, authorizing a full credit (plus $10 for my shipping cost) of my original purchase price. The sneaker is good quality and comfortable, but I still do not like the lacing method, which I have also seen other brands use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Shoe Fit So I wore It!
customer_reviews.text: I have used them three times this week to play pickleball and while that isn't enough time to say with certainty that these will be great shoes they do fit well, offer support and provide good traction on the court. Over time we will check back to let people know how they have held up and if they remain as comfortable as this first impression.
customer_reviews.author: Chimester

customer_reviews.title: Less cushioning than expected
customer_reviews.text: Seems like great stability, but I need more cushioning. Pickleball Ace indicated "fantastic cushioning." Unfortunately, that was not the fit I experienced. The price seems great and it's hard to tell about general performance. So I'm still looking, but going back to my Hoka One One for the time being even at a considerable price difference. As Pickleball continues to expand, I think we'll be seeing more shoe options and reviews.
customer_reviews.author: mcbeene

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for Length and Width
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looked well made but it was far too small. My 12 yr old son where's a size 9 (where his toes are comfortably at the top) in Sketcher's sport shoes. I ordered a 9 1/2 of the Adidas. It was way to small. A size 10 probably would have worked in length. The second problem was that these shoes are for people with narrow or average sized feet. My son has wide feet, not super wide, but definitely wide. I am sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good fit, discolors
customer_reviews.text: I easily replace three pairs of tennis shoes per year, and these had above average durability and fit, of the shoes I found advertised in the $45 - $65 price range. The primary drawback was cosmetic, as the light gray-ish and tranlucent rubber material on the upper (sides and near/over toes) discolored to a tinge of beige/brown. These were only worn in a clean indoor club tennis location, the plastic/rubber discolored -- they are NOT dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too large but well made.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great and are of good quality, especially for the incredible price. The only issue I have is that they run about an entire size too large. Unfortunately it feels like only a half-size when trying it on but once you play tennis in them for a few hours, they stretch to about a full size too large, which is problematic. If I could return them for a smaller size, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce722

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfort & support
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with Adidas shoes. Especially comfort and fit. Recently lost both big toe nails because covering a drop shot old shoes let feet slide and jammed toes which immediately turned purplish black!! Not happening with my new shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad knee, arthritis from an old skiing acident. I change my shoes about twice a year, even though they still look jug fine. This is my first pair of Adidas, and so far I am quite pleased after 6 uses. They are comfortable and provide good support. After two hours of play, my knee feels petty good.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Bjork

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality. I used them for 6 months. ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. I used them for 6 months. Wearing while playing tennis. They do not have support. I injured my toes several times playing tennis.
customer_reviews.author: MobileTech

customer_reviews.title: ... even though reviews on the Web saidthey were ADIDAS best shoe for the court
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were not usable on the racquetball court even though reviews on the Web saidthey were ADIDAS best shoe for the court. Almost fell many times because they did not have any traction on the hardwood court. Also had to send the first pair back because they were poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas N.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, excellent support
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for playing pickleball, they are perfect on the court. Good grip, lots of support, fit just as I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: mdl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. I have only played a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit well. The size seems consistent with other shoes I have purchased. They are lighter than the NB tennis shoes that they are replacing. Good quality. I have only played a couple of matches in them. I am heavy guy. We will see if they hold up as well as NB.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes to play tennis
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes to play tennis. I used to buy trekking / trail running shoes to play tennis and they used to wear out so fast. After quite a few pairs of those I decided to spend a little more and get these pair of tennis shoes based on recommendations from friends. The sole is very thick material and so far it is holding up very well. I intend to get at least 3-4 times more use from these shoes than the trail running shoes. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Vesper111

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shoes for working out
customer_reviews.text: I don't play tennis. I use these shoes for working out, which is mostly lifting weights. These shoes have been a solid choice for that. They also work well for P90X workouts. The fit has been great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: A shoe that fits
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and the size 9 1/2 fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My husband said they feel comfortable and he liked the looks of them. He plays tennis 5 days a week for 2 to 3 hours. I hope these will last. We will update later.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: very satisfied with these shoes. No break in period required, they were comfortable from the beginning. I feel that this shoe is a great value and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hodel

customer_reviews.title: Really like these tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really like these tennis shoes. Didn't know difference of shoes as a new tennis player, but can definitely tell. These look great and feel good and were a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Ian X Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for someone like me who has foot pain. Changed the sole in one shoe because I have an insole but much better than the previous Adidas shoes I had
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Barricades are the only shoes I play in!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly comfortable shoes! They are my go to court shoes for hard court and Har Tru tennis courts. I am a competitively ranked 4.5 player and the Barricade Club Tennis are the only shoes I play in.
customer_reviews.author: frankie

customer_reviews.title: Awkward color
customer_reviews.text: Some "blacks" aren't. They shine blue in the sun. Also a little too wide, so I have to make sure laces are very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Leschhorn

customer_reviews.title: Order a smaller size.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 9.5, but that pair was to large. No headache to return it, i went this time for a 9. Fits great. I love the black / red combo. The blue part looks like a plastic wrapped on the shoe, but i'm fine with that. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zen

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Pretty hard sole and I started feeling pain in my feet after playing tennis while wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: fair product
customer_reviews.text: didnt fit great. a little big. needed to put a extra insole in it. works ok now. average
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super narrow, but seemed nice
customer_reviews.text: The shoe's quality seems rather nice, but the reality is that these are rather narrow for their size. That was my experience at least.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Haines

customer_reviews.title: Not the same fit as my other Adidas.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought Adidas Barricade tennis shoes before. The fit is a little different. I have to wear a very thin sock. There ok but I'll probably go back to buying my shoes in a store were I can try them on.
customer_reviews.author: john terry

customer_reviews.title: Best court shoe I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, extremely comfortable and I wear them everyday to play Pickleball both indoors and Outdoors. Fantastic grip for the court whether it be wood, composite or asphalt. I would definitely buy them again
customer_reviews.author: kauaireader

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good to great.
customer_reviews.text: Fine. Arrived early and fits well. I've already been on the court a couple of time, and they feel pretty good. They also performed well. I did not notice any problems with acceleration, turning or stopping. So, good traction.
customer_reviews.author: Ford

customer_reviews.title: This are great shoes and price make them better
customer_reviews.text: This are great shoes and price make them better, very fresh and soft for regular plays. I will for sure get a second pair of this ones when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Salas Corrales

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: This shoe worked great. Was comfortable and snug. Gave me great traction on outdoor hard courts. I haven't played on anything else but I think it would do just as well.
customer_reviews.author: MCM

customer_reviews.title: My son wore these for three tennis matches and they ...
customer_reviews.text: My son wore these for three tennis matches and they completely came apart with a hole in the SIDE of the shoe and all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to play immediatley!
customer_reviews.text: I'm becoming an Adidas fan. These are my third Adidas I've purchased. These pair are comfortable and no breaking in required like most shoes. Great support and ideal for my racquetball game. Wish the dark grey was available in my size.
customer_reviews.author: MarioM

customer_reviews.title: Laces eye hole anchor has broken after 1 mo.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe lace eye hole broke free from the top part of the shoe so now one side of the laces is dangling free and not secured. I have only had the shoes for 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Karjala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives good foot support. Helped control foot pain from plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Interested Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Stability. Improced play
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. Good comfort and perfect. Almost my team here have same shoes. Great shoes and perfect price
customer_reviews.author: Venkata

customer_reviews.title: I think it has good balance, reasonable weight
customer_reviews.text: I think it has good balance, reasonable weight, it's tough for drag effect of court and very well padded inside that gives you comfort for extended sets. Also very simple design none of the flamboyant colors you tend to see lately.
customer_reviews.author: ALVAROCHILE

customer_reviews.title: I got bad shin splints right after switching to these
customer_reviews.text: They're really cushy and comfey but they don't feel very supportive around my ankles. I got bad shin splints right after switching to these.. not saying it's the shoes fault but it's a little suspicious
customer_reviews.author: D. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but need to be broken in
customer_reviews.text: This took awhile to break in - over 10 hours of play on clay. I find the size 11.5 to be a little narrow in the front of the shoe. It loosened up after breaking in (still snug but manageable). I like the weight and durability of them.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best tennis shoes EVER. I have narrow feet and these shoes feel like they were tailored for me. The laces hold very well when you are tying up so they are evenly snug even up front. Lastly, they are very well ventilated. Get two before they change them up.
customer_reviews.author: Dannydreamer

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Having had and used every pair of barricades since inception, these feel light on the feet compared to many. They are comfortable and supportive. The biggest drawback could possibly be the laces. I have narrow feet so have to pull the laces fairly tight. I suspect the laces may pull the cloth away from the top of the shoe after heavy use, but will have to wait and see. Impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Confirmed quality and reliability
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, as expected. I have been using Adidas tennis shoes for some time now, and never have had a reason for changing brand. Comfortable, durable and good looking also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy for Indoor Pickleball
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of these shoes on the indoor pickleball courts. They have nice support and cushioning. The grip is nice without a lot of squeaking. And they look great.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK H DRIES III

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Odd footbed. Feels uneven. Has a weird lump inside it that is terribly uncomfortable. Did a human person ever try this one before manufacturing thousands of them? These are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I prefer a bit wide and these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: UW

customer_reviews.title: HS tennis
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have held up amazingly well on the tennis court. My son plays Varsity tennis and he usually tears up a pair every few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: chjbrown22

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes to play tennis in!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, and he loves them. He has wide feet and finds them very comfortable. They seem to have a lot of support for tennis playing.
customer_reviews.author: BRat

customer_reviews.title: but still feel great. They were a bit stiff
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a little larger than other adias shoes that I've purchased in the past, but still feel great. They were a bit stiff, but once broken in are a great shoe. They're very comfortable and have just the right grip on the court.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gazze

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: extremely comfortable and worth the price. my father cant believe how amazingly comfortable and attractive they are, especially for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Souki

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son. Great tennis shoes. Good support where needed. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: LLS

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Court Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these shoes about a dozen times, but like the stability provided by the fit. Candidly, I am waiting to see how well they wear...many other brands have worn out after just a few months, and I am hopeful these will wear much longer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great court shoe
customer_reviews.text: I use the Adidas Barricade Club for pickleball in outside courts. Great grip and ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo Isassi

customer_reviews.title: Great for tennis
customer_reviews.text: They lasted me two years now. Nice tennis shoes, decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Supplemena

customer_reviews.title: These are the best. So stable
customer_reviews.text: I started wearing the barricades a few years ago now going from the 2's the 3's and now the 4's. These are the best. So stable, so durable. This is the only tennis shoe I'll buy.
customer_reviews.author: nblinow

customer_reviews.title: these are as good or better than my previous models
customer_reviews.text: Have always worn adidas, these are as good or better than my previous models. Long lasting well made sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great, it just ran a little small and narrow for a size 7.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie shelton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable from first use.
customer_reviews.text: Using indoors on court. Good cushion and traction. Strong toe to keep from wearing through. Good ventilation. Bought a second pair for backup after these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I've just started to break these tennis shoes in. They seemed fine. I wore them once and played about two and a half hours on hard court. I didn't notice them one way or another. That's actually a good thing
customer_reviews.author: Retired Al

customer_reviews.title: Mesh Easily Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Mesh tore in less than 2 weeks of use playing pickleball
customer_reviews.author: zygr

customer_reviews.title: It's OK.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe size is kind of big, but it's OK, and original insole is not comfortable that much, it's feels kind of small. So, I'm using a different insole instead of original.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Adidas barricade tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes for the price. I usually take a size 7 but ordered a size 8 and it fits perfectly. Nice and nice and comfortable tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DP888

customer_reviews.title: A little tight. Adidas usually run wider, but ...
customer_reviews.text: A little tight. Adidas usually run wider, but these do not. They also slip a bit on a turf court.
customer_reviews.author: Vince1

customer_reviews.title: Need to be broken in
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. Took some getting used to and needed to be stretched out. He wears them for tennis all the time.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis shoes. fits a bit too big
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a 10.5 these shoes felt big so I got a 10. They worked out but I think the sizes are wrong because the 10.5 is big and 10 is small
customer_reviews.author: rickston79

customer_reviews.title: purchased as gift for teenage son
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who plays tennis in high school. They were big and he did not care for the style
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Saw this shoe at a local store. Didn't have my size and so I ordered online. Delivered promptly and fit well. Very comfortable shoe for the recreational (3.5) tennis player.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I used it just twice since I got it last week and so it may be a little too early to give a complete review, but I am really loving it. I was able to get going right away without waiting for the shoe to break or anything and it was as I have been using it for a while. I may purchase another one of these in a month or two if I still love it then as I do now.
customer_reviews.author: Raj Abraham

customer_reviews.title: The most important thing was that I received my package in good conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I recevied my package yesterday, so conforable, beautifull and resistant. My husband love it. Thank you, I follow up buying you as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: BM-215047 ANGELICA ENCARNACION

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For my son playing tennis for his school. Nice fit, and comfortable according to him.
customer_reviews.author: MonTex

customer_reviews.title: The tread design is fine for paved trails but tends to pick up small ...
customer_reviews.text: The tread design is fine for paved trails but tends to pick up small stones on gravel or small rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Promising but they run small.
customer_reviews.text: My toes were at the end and I was wearing thin sock liners. I might need a full size up to have proper space for an athletic shoes and cushioned socks. These seem to have excellent support and structure. They look good too.
customer_reviews.author: Sabelle

customer_reviews.title: Good choice at a reasonable price, for habitual players.
customer_reviews.text: I like it and I use them to play tennis on clay courts.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Look great and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Look great and fit perfectly! My feet are slightly flat and these shoes give the extra arch support I needed. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David Lyons

customer_reviews.title: We like them.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son. He reports: they feel good, comfortable, good traction. Look very cool. My report is they came quick, look solid at price was nice.
customer_reviews.author: J Patel

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoes, but not much room in the toebox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stiff as a board
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are incredibly uncomfortable and stiff. Brutal on your heels. Stay away from these Barricades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... these for my son and he says they're very comfortable. I don't know if it's something specific that ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son and he says they're very comfortable. I don't know if it's something specific that he did, but these uniform spots (almost like leopard spots) have appeared on the toe of both shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, affordable and functional
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit as expected, and were perfect for the movements involved on a tennis court. They are lightweight, breathable, and provide excellent traction. As a bonus, they are affordable and look pretty cool. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for pickle ball
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are lightweight, easy to put on and off and very comfortable. They are just a little shorter than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Larry S

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well. Will most likely purchase again when I need new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Calen

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Only worn them one day so far but already feel broken in. Look and feel like high quality at a fair price. They are attractive too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Wears them to the gym and says they are a great fit! He will be trying them out on ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend and he loves them!! Wears them to the gym and says they are a great fit! He will be trying them out on a tennis court soon but says they should do just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: ... for a firm rating but so far a very good shoe. Comfortable and light weight with decent flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used long enough for a firm rating but so far a very good shoe. Comfortable and light weight with decent flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 9 1/2 but he knows that in ADIDAS he is one size bigger, 10 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Paula I.

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: They were a tiny bit more narrow than preferred but will hopefully stretch out a bit. Will see if they are available in wide width next time. Overall am pleased so far... have only been wearing for a week. Time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Langley

customer_reviews.title: very happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: very happy with these shoes. feel supported when I plant. Not crazy about the pink laces so I replaced them with white ones. now they look great and I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Clark & Amy

customer_reviews.title: These have been the only shoes to survive more than three months at time - great toe protection
customer_reviews.text: My son goes through shoes very quickly. He plays tennis and other sports and drags his toe, which causes holes to form quickly. These have been the only shoes to survive more than three months at time - great toe protection.
customer_reviews.author: Chris V

customer_reviews.title: Bought for son...he loves them
customer_reviews.text: Got very fast the shoes that I thought I was ordering. My son just started playing tennis and he loves these shoes. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Amy Roden

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: great look and really comfortable. My husband is really happy with them
customer_reviews.author: lau

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes lasted me about four months (playing about once a week) before I got holes near my big toes on the bottom of the shoe. Not very durable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Quinton Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Immediately Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have a slightly wide foot and purchased these because of other reviews that said toe box was slightly wide. These are perfect for me. Love them BUT have only played 2 matches so far.
customer_reviews.author: viewer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable. must run a little larger than most size ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoe, does the trick, comfortable. must run a little larger than most size 10.5's
customer_reviews.author: legg7596

customer_reviews.title: ) Great shoe as well
customer_reviews.text: First 14.5 I've found - 14 is just to small - thank you Adidas for making a 14.5: ) Great shoe as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark  60

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: A little tight at first, but after several days of breakin, felt fine. Performed well on pickleball court. Waiting to see how they perform on clay tennis court.
customer_reviews.author: AmaJohn

customer_reviews.title: A lil stiff but I account that to them being ...
customer_reviews.text: A lil stiff but I account that to them being new. The color is vibrant & I have gotten a few compliments already
customer_reviews.author: A.D. Sirles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent low to the ground traction! Great for quick lateral moves and more natural feel without over cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: thomas w.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe for the price. Felt clunky compared to my preferred shoe.
customer_reviews.author: DWT

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Barricade Club Tennis Shoe
product_meta.description: Walk on the court ready to rally and attack the net with these lightweight men's tennis shoes. Aggressive players will appreciate the supportive TORSION SYSTEM midfoot with every lunge. They feature ADIPRENE under the heel for extra cushioning.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Lightweight air mesh upper for maximum breathability
Abrasion-resistant Adituff wraps around the toe and medial forefoot to help protect against foot drag that occurs during serves, volleys and extreme lateral movements
360-degree TPU support foil for durability in key abrasion areas and superior lateral stability
Lightweight EVA midsole; 3D Torsion provides adaptive midfoot support
Full-length Adiprene+ for comfort and superior cushioning at impact; Adiwear outsole offers the ultimate in high-wear durability
